solution_line_template: The number of students that play sports is {total_students} * {sports_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_students}*{sports_percentage_decimal}={students_play_sports}>>{students_play_sports} students.

The number of students that play soccer is {students_play_sports} * {soccer_percentage_decimal} = <<{students_play_sports}*{soccer_percentage_decimal}={students_play_soccer}>>{students_play_soccer} students
